com.interfaces.robotstories

Class create_play

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.interfaces.robotstories.create_play

  • public class create_play
extends Activity
    Interface to create or modify the properties of a play Creates an axuliar play if there is no one created previously before calling any other activity. can't go to main_interfaz until all the data are saved correctly
    Author:
    Arturo Gil

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void changeType2()
      Set type of vertical size (mm, inches, cm, whatever) based on spin value asigned for type of horizontal size
      private void iniLayout()
      Set an appropiated size for the images of the buttons (still only add action, add robot and play) Set name of vertical size based on spin value Set previous defined values in their places (if we go to create_play to modify a play)
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Add listeners to buttons, and calls to iniLayout.
      private void saveAndGo()
      Save title, desc and size and come back to main interfaz, if all the data is alright, check if there exist already a play, if not, it create it and send to the main interfaz
